summary: Email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and another individual regarding the review of a draft Q&A document and direct examination materials for an upcoming event involving a female subject arriving on Saturday night. The email discusses timing and requests line edits.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email discussing a draft Q&A document and requesting review before a female subject's arrival.

events.title: Email exchange about Q&A draft review
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the review of a draft Q&A document and direct examination materials in preparation for an arrival of a female subject.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Email correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Discussion centers on reviewing a draft Q&A document and direct examination materials (Direct_Examination_v4.doex).
Timing is emphasized, with a request for review before a female subject's arrival on a Saturday night.
The email suggests ongoing legal preparation or coordination related to an event or case.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00016495).
